code:
import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";// Creating store, middleware and compose displays reponse on redux dev tools in Chrome extension
import thunk from"redux-thunk";// It is Middlware
import rootReducer from'./reducers';// Return Response Payload Data
// Initializing State
var initialState={};// Redux Thunk is a middleware that lets you call action creators that return a function instead of an action object
var middleware=[thunk];// Dev Tools
var devTools=process.env.NODE_ENV==='development'?window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__():null;// Creating Store
var store=createStore(rootReducer,initialState,compose(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware),devTools));export default store;
